.content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area{padding-right:2.5rem;width:calc(100% - 300px)}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:100%}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:18.75rem}}.site-content__layout--full-width .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:0;padding-right:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:1rem}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:2rem;padding-right:1rem}.site-content__layout--app *{margin-bottom:0;margin-top:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:0}}.site-content__layout--app .site-main{background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,right top,from(#bdcadb),color-stop(20%,#d8e4f2),color-stop(47%,#deeaf8),color-stop(72%,#d8e4f3),to(#c1cedf));background:-o-linear-gradient(left,#bdcadb 0,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf 100%);background:linear-gradient(90deg,#bdcadb,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf)}.site-content--has-story-package-hero{max-width:100%;overflow-x:hidden}.widget-area{position:relative;z-index:1}.widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}.widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.widget-area .article-list__heading,.widget-area .widget-title{font-family:Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;text-transform:uppercase;text-align:center;width:100%}@media (min-width:64rem){.widget-area img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative;background-color:#ebebeb}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile) img{height:100%;left:0;left:50%;margin-right:-50%;position:absolute;top:0;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%);-ms-transform:translate(-50%);transform:translate(-50%);width:auto}.image-wrapper.portrait-headshot{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:133.33333%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.portrait-headshot img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.square{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:100%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.square                <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://kfor.com/news/man-who-claimed-he-killed-16-people-now-linked-to-5-deaths-official-confirms/">
                 Man who claimed he killed 16 people now linked to 5 deaths, official confirms
                </a>
               </h4>
              </div>
             </article>
             <article class="article-list__article">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">

     <div class="site-content__layout site-content__layout--has-sidebar">
      <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--hero-full" data-module-type="standard layout" id="standard-layout">
       <h2 class="article-list__heading screen-reader-text">
        Headlines
       </h2>
       <div class="article-list__content">
        <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type main-story-link" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1421924" data-collection="article-list1" data-index="0">
         <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list1" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context="[]">
          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link main-story-link" data-link-label="Two Mustang High School students killed in car accident, officials say" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-main-link" href="https://kfor.com/news/two-mustang-high-school-students-killed-in-car-accident-officials-say/">
            Two Mustang High School students killed in car accident, officials say
           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
           <a class="article-list__article-category-link category-link-0" data-link-label="News" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-category-link" href="https://kfor.com/news/">
            News
           </a>
           /
           <time datetime="2021-03-21T16:39:31-05:00">
            6 hours ago
           </time>
          </footer>
         </div>
         <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">

        <!-- Video center -->
        <section class="article-list article-list--headline-two-col" data-context="homepage_top_stories">
         <h2 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--notched article-list__heading--bottom-divider">
          Top Stories
         </h2>
         <div class="article-list__content">
          <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1421721" data-collection="article-list2" data-index="0">
           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">

             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list4" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://kfor.com/news/local/i-kind-of-wanted-to-help-little-kids-5th-6th-graders-at-moore-elementary-school-take-safety-patrol-seriously/">

               </a>

               </a>
               /

              <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
               <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">

                 <defs>

                   .cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}
                  </style>
                 </defs>
                 <path class="cls-1" d="M842 1167.5l-11 6.5v-13z" data-name="video small carousel button default" id="video_small_carousel_button_default" transform="translate(-831 -1161)">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </span>
               <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">
                Video
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
            </article>
           </div>
           <div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">
            <a href="https://kfor.com/news/great-state/">
             More Great State News
             <span class="icon icon--arrow">
              <svg viewbox="0 0 17.938 10.94" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
               <path d="M17.944 5.55a.733.733 0 0 1-.032.34v.03c0 .01-.006.01-.008.01a.189.189 0 0 1-.028.05.619.619 0 0 1-.123.17c-.009.01-.013.02-.023.03l-4.927 4.56a.733.733 0 0 1-.5.19.753.753 0 0 1-.54-.23.737.737 0 0 1 .041-1.04l3.547-3.28H.738a.735.735 0 1 1 0-1.47h14.693l-3.74-3.68a.735.735 0 0 1 1.03-1.05l5.022 4.94s0 .01.008.01a.016.016 0 0 0 .017.01.8.8 0 0 1 .163.32c.007.03.009.06.013.09z">

          <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--one-col">
           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            Pay It 4ward
           </h2>
           <div class="article-list__content">
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1417695" data-collection="article-list7" data-index="0">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list7" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://kfor.com/news/pay-it-4ward/oklahoma-moms-rewarded-for-helping-thousands-book-their-covid-19-shot/">
                Oklahoma moms rewarded for helping thousands book their COVID-19 shot
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://kfor.com/news/pay-it-4ward/">
                Pay It 4ward
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-18T07:50:40-05:00">
                4 days ago
               </time>
              </footer>
             </div>
             <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://kfor.com/news/pay-it-4ward/oklahoma-moms-rewarded-for-helping-thousands-book-their-covid-19-shot/">
               <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6448514">

          </h2>

             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://kfor.com/video/man-in-custody-after-stealing-frito-lay-truck-and-leading-police-on-a-pursuit-from-oklahoma-city-to-enid/6456643/">

               </div>
               <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                 <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                  <defs>
                   <style>

             </a>
            </figure>

               </div>
               <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                 <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                  <defs>
                   <style>
                    .cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}

                 Video

              </div>
             </a>
            </figure>
           </article>

               </div>
               <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                 <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                  <defs>
                   <style>

             </a>
            </figure>

               </div>
               <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">

            </figure>

             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">

              </a>
             </h3>
            </div>

              </a>
             </h3>

              <h2 class="screen-reader-text">
               Hourly Forecast
              </h2>
              <div class="weather-timeline__timeline-content">
               <div class="weather-timeline__timeline-item" data-date="11 PM Sunday, March 21" data-humidity="50">
                <a href="#" role="button">
                 <div class="item-top">
                  <h4 class="temperature">
                   59°
                  </h4>
                  <h5 class="time">
                   11 PM
                  </h5>
                  <figure class="icon">

       <section class="widget widget--has-z-index-stacking-reset widget_media_image" data-component="dropzoneWidget" id="media_image-34">
        <h2 class="widget-title">
         Daily Oklahoma Coronavirus Data
        </h2>
        <a href="https://kfor.com/news/coronavirus/cdc-oklahomas-covid-19-deaths-climb-by-29/">

        </a>
       </section>

            <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://kfor.com/news/married-66-years-husband-wife-die-minutes-apart-of-virus/">
             <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
              <div class="image-wrapper landscape">

           </figure>
          </article>

             <path d="M17.944 5.55a.733.733 0 0 1-.032.34v.03c0 .01-.006.01-.008.01a.189.189 0 0 1-.028.05.619.619 0 0 1-.123.17c-.009.01-.013.02-.023.03l-4.927 4.56a.733.733 0 0 1-.5.19.753.753 0 0 1-.54-.23.737.737 0 0 1 .041-1.04l3.547-3.28H.738a.735.735 0 1 1 0-1.47h14.693l-3.74-3.68a.735.735 0 0 1 1.03-1.05l5.022 4.94s0 .01.008.01a.016.016 0 0 0 .017.01.8.8 0 0 1 .163.32c.007.03.009.06.013.09z">
             </path>
            </svg>
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
        </section>
       </section>
       <section class="widget widget--has-z-index-stacking-reset widget_ns-article-bin" data-component="dropzoneWidget" id="ns-article-bin-7">
